name: Pitch Black (Harsha-Games)
description:
Pitch Black | A Platformer  (Double Click Green Flag)
___________________________________________

                           [ Difficulty: Mediocre ]

In this creepy, dark platformer, run through the 10 levels to make it out of the complete darkness. Many useful items have been abandoned there too. Trampolines, speed boosts, all sorts of stuff. Avoid spikes!

Controls:
- Arrow keys to move.
- Avoid spikes.
- Use trampolines.
- Go fast with a speed boost!
